about_the_game:
Overview

Choose whether to be a boy or girl, what you choose will affect the story path in various ways with differing text and actions.

The Protagonist

You've just moved to a small town after being banished from your old town and want to start making friends (with benefits).

Main Goal

Your main goal is to get all the girls to like you as well as their panties, possessions and pictures so you can stash them in your drawer. You do this by going on dates with them and getting them to like you enough so get get into bed with you. Once you have got all the girls to like you, you must choose one to date and reject the rest. You can date multiple girls at the same time and there's no limit to which way you finish the game.

An arctic fox who likes playing guitar and is into satanism. In her spare time, she plays in a band called the Arctic Foxes. Works as a web designer for Peta and designs the t-shirts for her band. She is very outgoing, sometimes too much in the sexual department - has been caught masturbating to her band mates countless times, she says it doesn't help that they're all boys and she's the only girl. Secretly has a crush on the bass player, but doesn't know how to tell him.

Visit their ClopPad profile: (copy & paste into new browser tab)

A shy tabby cat who likes to read and keeps to herself. She works at the local convienience store and doesn't have many friends. Sometimes can't be arsed to put on underwear or lower-half clothing when going to work. She has been caught once when she was bending over to pick up a shelf item, but has yet to get fired for it, her best guess is that her boss likes her.

Visit their ClopPad profile: (copy & paste into new browser tab)

A red fox who likes to draw animal hentai and masturbate. She mostly spends her time at home where no one can see her, but sometimes likes exhibitionism. Does not like showing her breasts/feels embarrassed by them. Secretly likes storing her "own brew" in water bottles and doesn't throw them away.

Visit their ClopPad profile: (copy & paste into new browser tab)

A MILF sheep who works at the local strip club where she loves pole dancing and fucking horny men in the back of the club for reasonable prices. At home she also does porn movies on the side with anyone who pays her enough. She's been around and has dirt in her wool to show.

Visit their ClopPad profile: (copy & paste into new browser tab)

Daughter of Sheep: A sheep who wishes people would notice her and her sexual ability. She is needy, but rough and would like to do naughty things to someone else in private and public and lose her virginity. She often hears her mother and others, both male and female fucking in the sex room next door and gets off to it. She has a side hustle of posting her nudes online for horny men and she is up for experimenting with any fetish or sexual conquest. Is in an incest relationship with her mother. 

Visit their ClopPad profile: (copy & paste into new browser tab)

- 16 dateable characters (5 already available!)

- 3 state time cycling (morning, afternoon and evening).

- Time skipping so you can date girls instantly, even if it's the wrong time.

- During the dates you will be given mini-games to complete so you can complete the date.

- Unlock and view photographs that girls give you in the gallery.

- Head to the local public toilets to peak on girls.

- View your date progress using the clipboard in the hub.

- Point & Click around various places you visit.

- Revisit places you've visited to collect items you've missed.

- Find collectables on dates and stash them in your drawer for later use.

- Hand-drawn assets made in Paint Tool SAI.

- A beautiful soundtrack fully composed by us.

Visit the in-game website: (copy & paste into new browser tab)

Support our work on Patreon: [/url] and get high-res versions of the assets used in our games, music, art and more!

You can also leave a review to say what you think about Town Girls!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains strong reference to drug use, nudity, sexual intercourse and fetish.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi Radeon 6670 or later
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative SoundBlaster 16 compatible or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 64-bit Intel processor (Apple Silicon through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi Radeon 6630M or later
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Town Girls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6200 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi Radeon 6670/Intel HD Graphics 3000 or later
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative SoundBlaster 16 compatible or better
  • Additional Notes: Ignore notice underneath about Windows 7, we will continue to support Windows 7 regardless of Steam's support.

reviews:
“I like how the characters are written and the overall shape of the game so far.”
10/10 – Hype

“I was pleasantly surprised by how fleshed out the lore was.”
10/10 – JustARandomFurry5

“Direction is good and the updates are keeping it fresh, gameplay could use some tweaks, characters are well written and given plenty of spotlight/room to grow.”
5/10 – Guild
short_description: After being banished from your old town, you want to start making friends (with benefits).
